staxel.village.character.dialogue.Cecile: Supposedly, my grandmother used to run a ^c:1486b0;grocery store^c:pop; around here...
I heard she ran off to the big city as soon as she saw her chance!
Not sure what happened to the store after that though.
Now that the town is insured, ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; will let me do anything!
Well...almost anything. He still won't give me permission to build a hadron collider...
I really hope ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; knows I didn't mean to scare him with that explosion...
It really was just an accident...
